snippet: A charge of sexual battery against the officer, Lt. Col. Jeffrey Krusinski, was dropped on Thursday, and the prosecutor instead will pursue a charge of assault and battery.
abstract: Sexual battery charge against Air Force Lt Col Jeffrey Krusinski is dropped after closer investigation; prosecutor will instead pursue charge of assault and battery.
lead_paragraph: A charge of sexual battery against the officer, Lt. Col. Jeffrey Krusinski, was dropped on Thursday, and the prosecutor instead will pursue a charge of assault and battery.

headline.main: Virginia: Charge Against Air Force Officer Is Altered
headline.print_headline: Virginia: Charge Against Air Force Officer Is Altered

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
